#summary A snappy tutorial
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Installation =

Choose an installer from the [http://code.google.com/p/horns/ Featured Downloads] section.

Mac, Windows, Linux, and a portable version are available.

= Usage =

Interpreter:

{{{
% horns
}}}

Script mode:

{{{
% horns script.lsp
}}}

= Example code =

Save the following as hello.lsp.

{{{
(print "Hello World")
}}}


  # Open a terminal.
  # {{{cd}}} to the directory containing hello.lsp.
  # Run {{{horns hello.lsp}}}

The output should be

{{{Hello World}}}
